title: Restrap Bar Pack puts 10L of fully waterproof storage capacity on your handlebar
content:
Until now, Restrap had just two handlebar bag options; a 14L Bar Bag and a 1.5L Canister Bag. The all-new Restrap Bar Pack fills the void between those two sizes with a 10L capacity, and it is handmade in Yorkshire, England. They brand describe it as an all-rounder, just as suitable for long gravel excursions […]

The post Restrap Bar Pack puts 10L of fully waterproof storage capacity on your handlebar appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
